FIELD.NAME: contenthash
FIELD.COMMENT: A unique identifier associated with the resource based on SHA1 hash of resource content.

FIELD.NAME: plugin
FIELD.COMMENT: The plugin component name of the metadata extractor.

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: The status code of metadata extraction.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: UNIX epoch date/time that this record was created.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: UNIX epoch date/time that this record was modified.
